Knight Guardian Eve Leonel Hunter:
Among the heroes were those who did not get a reward for performing tasks to overcome their limits and get new powers. We have decided to support these heroes and prepared for their equipment.
it is for all those who carry out the task to overcome the limit and get new powers, but has not received the equipment as a reward. For this we need only to prove the performance of tasks.
Reward for each task only once, you can get.
Conditions for obtaining awards
Click Run Job "Know your limit"
- Perform the task "Get over your limit"
